description:
Adam had heard that Marcus Mojo has been experimenting with all kinds of new things. He tried kettle corn for the first time the other day. It was delicious! Last week he held an iguana. It was scary but thrilling! And since he broke up with his girlfriend, Marcus has been dabbling in a few other areas. Adam couldn't be more curious about it.

When Marcus admits that, yes, he has indeed been getting into some interesting situations with some friends, Adam's cock perks right up. Soon, Adam is on his knees with Marcus's hard dick in his mouth. From there the guys heat it up further and move to the bedroom where they get into some hot 69 action. Today Marcus tried sucking Adams fat cock... it was delicious!

Enjoy!
title: Trying New Things
